review: Great - used it on our outdoor TV. Excellent and exceeds expectations.
author: John

review: I am sorry we didn't buy this earlier.  Easy to install, easy to use.  Selection of Prime programs excellent.
author: Kayakgirl

review: Works for Netflix as expected. The other apps were not well developed or "clips only" videos that aren't worth the effort and space.
author: Kyle Comeau

review: Easy to setup reasonable price good buy
author: VERONICA MCCASTER

review: I can only get prime on the fire stick.  I thought  would be able to get more.  T tried the NetFlick App and so far it has not worked.  It looked so great in your presentation That at last I had found something that would work  for me
author: NWY

review: What a wonderful, easy solution.  Love it!
author: Saralin

review: I am very surprised at all the possibilities I have with this viewing option!!  Thanks Amazon for another great product
author: Sara Vriesen

review: We have had one for about 2-3 weeks.  It is a great product.  I was looking to lower my cable bill and this is a great alternative.  It does everything that I need.  My kids love this.  They are able to watch what they want to watch whenever they want.  That are some great apps that I loaded on for the kids.  Well worth the money.  I have cable internet so I have no problems with speed and there are no delays.
author: Kurt Lathwell

review: gonna really look it over more this afternoon, but so far so good it works fine and now i dont need my iphone or tablet to watch tv
author: Oreomama
